display_long_description:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

[media]

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

[media]

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

[media]

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

[media]

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

[media]

**Talk to the Devs and join our community on Discord**:  https://discord.gg/cK4aG9sp8f
display_long_description_unprocessed:
You’re not just a cleaner. You’re an undercover agent, infiltrating the world of **crime and insanity** by posing as a cleaner, secretly collecting evidence against a mysterious hitman. The hitman runs a large organization called the Syndicate.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618274_651211461159970_363128261145746290_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=us1CaakaCRsQ7kNvwGKlZ2b&_nc_oc=Adl30-RQzAc72oEHpixTo1WZIQreO1ET80dDj1Q_zLUzGr5tWCRWjT_vxjpp6LfdXOc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OLmhgfWPbvYetQP4a8tByQ&oh=00_Afv2crXTzcdd5_g5am4A9gmLfppcZEhCqqmpcJRDw5JT0g&oe=69845756)

The deeper you dig, the closer you get to uncovering how he operates—and how he does his assassinations.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491828038_841072975026277_681659773377307198_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=lKSnlohk7hEQ7kNvwGTw1Gv&_nc_oc=AdmaLbL1eQ1nQ0yLBjrrorTNw-a2o_tzO58Fp47Tx9fu129tBdKfzPEGOjv8PpLAb1w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OLmhgfWPbvYetQP4a8tByQ&oh=00_AfuFEp6Axyvyiu5fFgByWGjkF6mh7jf8xzQ347EAMSAR1Q&oe=69845805)

The game has a scary layer. As you explore a crime scene, unsettling things could happen—shadows, whispers & apparitions.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491825050_1360261182487425_1701726842792685932_n.mp4?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=v6KW5GYZLQ8Q7kNvwEXa6t7&_nc_oc=AdkjyVTln4WQ6_04gqk9lT7kG02k7zT3FeqCnuv5iJkHWVXNxj9Y2hEZMb3QAilREWs&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OLmhgfWPbvYetQP4a8tByQ&oh=00_AfuaR1YY2qlvKDKSTE_m9IKpusegLrB8FOoFaCwFQA7XtA&oe=69846231)

**Your mission**: Infiltrate the Syndicate, and capture the Hitman. The Syndicate doesn’t tolerate failure. And they definitely don’t tolerate rats.

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499303585_2027694071311803_6829180901132345132_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=z8tL0jQfo1UQ7kNvwFha4CX&_nc_oc=AdkigpXNjRRIBOIv3WrEgJsaicnuMJHCOU2RzFQ-gioUNdUHGD8ggAZ6k1DQ307LfnY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OLmhgfWPbvYetQP4a8tByQ&oh=00_AftvdI0Y5N1uvdKbsaVubwcWHCsgYxjWGs1rceMk7W-w-g&oe=69844D63)

Each dead body has a background story of their own and you can explore more around to gather evidence and know more about the dead. The more you explore, the more rewarding it is. 

![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822924_4109581859309473_406554525783631080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=WYl4M6LuXagQ7kNvwFoc2Zd&_nc_oc=AdmrJ1weoRPAyseOISqRrTafQ6b6H7eH2aNKZXWBvD2q5-F2SpM24rIhKPrnBbmdZmY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=OLmhgfWPbvYetQP4a8tByQ&oh=00_AfveL8qbH-vLaGJ6RBVVJtq0tHJ-G-L3C58mXHwab-9Mzg&oe=6984632A)
